title: FIL COUPÉ JACQUARD WRAP
desc: Wrap made from cotton- and silk-blend jacquard fil coupé fabric. This item features a placed floral motif and is complete with contrasting plain-coloured edges.• Regular fit• Pointed collar• Kimono sleeves• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size S
